tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    social_media_post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(20),
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tweet_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_label VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE SentimentResults (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    positive_reviews INT,
    negative_reviews INT
)

CREATE TABLE PostDetails (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(50),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserSentiments (
    user_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserReviews (
    user_id INT,
    positive_reviews INT,
    negative_reviews INT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category TEXT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP
);
